reviewText: These two movies are so special and heart warming,each in their own way. I am a great fan of the wonderful actors in both movies. If you like clean,happy,sad,feel good movies,these will do the trick.
summary: 2 for the price of 1,can't go wrong.

reviewText: We've had One Special Night on a video for a long time. We watch it over and over. So, when I saw A Time to Remember combined on a DVD I wanted it! Both are great!

reviewText: James Gardner and Julie Andrews make magic again in this movie.  They are masters of their craft, and this is a movie to be watched, savored, and watched again.  Love these two together!

reviewText: These two movies are both gems:  brilliantly acted and totally engrossing.  Family care, relationships that need mending, and the problems faced by those dealing with Alzheimers are but a few of the endearing themes woven through these productions.  I will return to "A Time to Remember" as I continue to deal with a family Alzheimer's situation, and I've already watched "One Special Night" more times than I can recall.  James Garner and Julie Andrews are magnificent together and I keep wishing there could be a sequel to this movie!  Both films are perfect Thanksgiving/Christmas views for family members, although I will watch them whenever I need a break from the stresses of our turbulent times.  Hats off to the cast and crew of both films -- I rate them A+ in every respect.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought movie for my friend, and having 2 movies on 1 dvd is a bonus. Very happy with movies.
